| icon           = poe2 astringent_salve_icon.png
| description    = In a somewhat ironic twist, Rymrgand, god decay and misfortune, provided you with this regenerative ointment as a boon for fulfilling your oath to him. The salve is the consistency of tallow and has the stink of a rotting carcass. The waxy substance pulses, as though maggots boil just under the surface.
